Happy Hour.name: Happy Hour
Happy Hour.blurb: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.
Happy Hour.description: Innate: Gragas periodically  heals for  6% maximum health upon using an ability.

Barrel Roll.name: Barrel Roll
Barrel Roll.blurb: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
Barrel Roll.description: Active: Gragas rolls a cask to the target location, granting  sight around it and fermenting over 2 seconds, increasing its damage and  slow strength, up to a maximum of 150%. Barrel Roll can be recast after the cask has fully travelled.
Barrel Roll.leveling:
Non-Minion Magic Damage:
80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 70% AP)
Non-Minion Maximum Magic Damage:
120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 105% AP)
Minion Magic Damage:
56 / 84 / 112 / 140 / 168 (+ 49% AP)
Minion Maximum Magic Damage:
84 / 126 / 168 / 210 / 252 (+ 73.5% AP)
Slow:
40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60%
Maximum Slow:
60 / 67.5 / 75 / 82.5 / 90%
Barrel Roll.description2: After 4 seconds the cask  detonates, dealing  magic damage to all surrounding enemies, reduced by 30% against  minions, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
Barrel Roll.description3: Recast: Gragas detonates the cask early.
Barrel Roll.notes:
* The cask ignores unit and terrain collision therefore it will only stop once it reaches the target location.
 On arrival the cask will begin to glow ever brighter as it ferments until it turns bright red.

 Barrel Roll has an internal cooldown while traveling so that Gragas may only make it explode on arrival.
 The charge-up countdown will only start once the cask stops rolling.

Drunken Rage.name: Drunken Rage
Drunken Rage.blurb: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
Drunken Rage.description: Active: Gragas reduces incoming damage for 2.5 seconds and channels for 0.75 seconds.
Drunken Rage.description2: Upon completing the  channel, Gragas' next basic attack within 5 seconds gains  50 bonus range and deals bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters.
Drunken Rage.leveling2:
Bonus Magic Damage:
20 / 50 / 80 / 110 / 140 (+ 7% of target's maximum health) (+ 50% AP)
Maximum Damage to Monsters:
320 / 350 / 380 / 410 / 440 (+ 50% AP)
Drunken Rage.notes:
* Applies  proc damage to the primary target and  area damage to surrounding targets.
 The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal.

Body Slam.name: Body Slam
Body Slam.blurb: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
Body Slam.description: Active: Gragas  charges forward, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon colliding with one as well as  knocking them back and  stunning them for 1 second.
Body Slam.description2: Body Slam's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if Gragas hits an enemy.
Body Slam.notes:
*  Flash can be casted during Body Slam.
 Units hit by Body Slam turn away from ’Gragas'.

Explosive Cask.name: Explosive Cask
Explosive Cask.blurb: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
Explosive Cask.description: Active: Gragas hurls a cask for 0.55 seconds to the target location exploding on impact, damaging all nearby enemies and  knocking them back 900 units from the epicenter of the explosion, while also briefly granting  sight of the nearby surroundings.
